content: increase m1l ws lift the strand between the last and the next stitch from back to front with the left needle then purl into the front of the loop to create a left-leaning increase on the right side k2tog knit two stitches together as one stitch ssk slip one stitch knitwise repeat with the second stitch place them back on the left needle and knit them together as one stitch through the back loop abbreviations st/ sts stitch/ stiches k knit stitch p purl stitch bor beginning of round pm place marker sm slip marker gsr german short row rs right side ws wrong side m1r make one right m1l make one left round/ rnds round/ rounds k2tog knit two stitches together ssk slip slip knit you are welcome to sell finished items made using this pattern either privately or commercially if you do so please give credit by mentioning pattern by thisi available on ravelry however do not copy distribute or sell the pattern itself not even in parts and not in modified form thank you for respecting my work 7
